function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of mobile apps for tracking COVID-19 infected persons","Impact":"Potential invasion of privacy, data security concerns","Mitigation":"Ensure strict data privacy policies, encryption of sensitive data","Technologies":"Data encryption, privacy protection tools","People":"General Population, Health Personnel","Owner":"Government, Technology Companies"},{"Description":"Reliance on video conferencing technologies for communications","Impact":"Cybersecurity risks, potential data breaches","Mitigation":"Use of secure communication protocols, regular security updates","Technologies":"Secure communication protocols, encryption, cybersecurity tools","People":"Business, Academia, General Population","Owner":"IT departments, Technology Companies"},{"Description":"Use of drones and robots for delivering medical supplies","Impact":"Safety and security of medical supplies, potential accidents","Mitigation":"Regulatory compliance, safety protocols for drone operations","Technologies":"Regulatory compliance tools, safety protocols, drone technology","People":"Medical Personnel, Rural/Remote Populations","Owner":"Government, Healthcare Organizations"}]}
